name: Jessica Tran
persona: Jessica Tran is a 21-year-old psychology major who has a CGPA of 2.66. She is moderately conscientious and shows average levels of self-discipline and perseverance, though she sometimes struggles with test anxiety. Jessica is motivated to improve her grades and is working on building her academic confidence. She is determined to make steady progress and is seeking strategies to better manage her time and stress.
